TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFeatureSupport

summary.span: 指定一个标准接口，用于从当前系统检索功能信息。

span.span: Specifies a standard interface for retrieving feature information from the current system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在类中实现时, 提供可用于确定当前是否已在系统上安装了某个功能的方法, 以及如何获取功能的版本号。When implemented in a class, provides methods you can use to determine whether a feature is currently installed on the system and to get the version number of a feature. 调用以确定当前是否安装了某个功能或某个功能的特定版本。Call to determine whether a feature, or a specific version of a feature, is currently installed. 调用以确定已安装功能的版本号。Call to determine the version number of an installed feature. 有关此接口的实现,请参见和类。See the and classes for implementations of this interface. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 和查询来实现该功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 检查版本是否为`null`, 以确定该功能是否存在。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 结果将显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Function GetVersionPresent (feature As Object) As Version

span.span: The feature whose version is requested.
Retrieves the version of the specified feature.

returns.span: 表示指定功能的版本号的 ；如果该功能未安装，则为 。

span.span: A representing the version number of the specified feature; or if the feature is not installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关此方法的实现, 请参见。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 下面的示例使用 和查询来实现该功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 检查版本是否为`null`, 以确定该功能是否存在。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 结果将显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 确定指定的功能在系统中当前是否可用。

span.span: Determines whether the specified feature is currently available on the system.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsPresent(object feature) cil managed
Public Function IsPresent (feature As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 确定系统当前是否有指定功能的任意版本。

span.span: Determines whether any version of the specified feature is currently available on the system.

returns.span: 如果提供该功能，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the feature is present; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用 和查询来实现该功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 检查版本是否为`null`, 以确定该功能是否存在。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 结果将显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsPresent (object feature, Version minimumVersion);

Public Function IsPresent (feature As Object, minimumVersion As Version) As Boolean
public: bool IsPresent(System::Object ^ feature, Version ^ minimumVersion);
abstract member IsPresent : obj * Version -> bool

param.name: minimumVersion
param.span: 表示要查找功能的最小版本号。

span.span: A representing the minimum version number of the feature to look for.

summary.span: 确定系统当前是否有指定功能的指定版本或更新版本。

span.span: Determines whether the specified or newer version of the specified feature is currently available on the system.

returns.span: 如果有所请求的该功能版本，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the requested version of the feature is present; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用 和查询来实现该功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 检查版本是否为`null`, 以确定该功能是否存在。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 结果将显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form.
